Department.title: Department
Department.description: Represents a department within the organization, such as ICT, SCM, or HR.

name.description: Name of the department (e.g., ICT, SCM, HR).

icon.description: The name of the lucide-react icon to use.

Document.title: Document
Document.description: Represents a document being tracked through the system.

type.description: The type of document (e.g., Invoice, Contract).

content.description: The main content or description of the document.

fileUrl.description: URL to the attached document file (e.g., in Firebase Storage).

workflowId.description: Reference to the Workflow this document follows.

currentStep.description: The current step index in the workflow's departmentIds array.

history.description: An array of historical actions taken on the document.

status.description: The overall status of the document's workflow.

pendingDepartmentId.description: The ID of the department where the document is currently awaiting action.

initiatorId.description: The ID of the user who initiated the document workflow.

initiatorName.description: The name of the user who initiated the document workflow.

DocumentHistory.title: DocumentHistory
DocumentHistory.description: Represents a single event in a document's workflow history.

fileUrl.description: URL to a specific version of a file associated with this history step.

Workflow.title: Workflow
Workflow.description: Defines a structured workflow for a specific document type.

description.description: A description of the workflow's purpose.

departmentIds.description: An ordered array of Department IDs representing the workflow path.

initiatorId.description: The ID of the user who initiated the workflow.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user (matches Firebase Auth UID).

role.description: The user's role in the system.

departmentId.description: Reference to Department. The department the user belongs to.

status.description: The status of the user account.

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Represents a notification sent to a user regarding a document's workflow.

userId.description: Reference to User. The user who received the notification.

message.description: The content of the notification message.

timestamp.description: Date and time when the notification was sent.

isRead.description: Indicates whether the user has read the notification.

/departments/{departmentId}.description: Stores all departments in the organization.

/documents/{documentId}.description: Stores all documents being tracked by the system.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles, linked to Firebase Auth by UID.

/users/{userId}/notifications/{notificat.description: Stores notifications for a specific user.
